channel.title: r on Big Data Time

item.title: Cheat Sheet - R
item.description: Reset R Environment # Clear environment of variables and functions rm(list = ls(all = TRUE)) # Clear environmet of packages if(is.null(sessionInfo()$otherPkgs) == FALSE)lapply(paste("package:", names(sessionInfo()$otherPkgs), sep=""), detach, character.only = TRUE, unload = TRUE) Import Data # from SQL install.packages("RODBC") library(RODBC) conn <- odbcConnect("localhost") Emp <- sqlQuery(conn,"select * from capstone.dbo.Emp") odbcClose(conn) # from CSV all_acquired <- read.csv('../filesPath/finalData.csv') EDA High Level Preview head(df,20) summary(df) str(df) Count Null Values numNAs <- apply(is.
